item.title: Happy Transformer
item.description: Happy Transformer is an API built on top of PyTorch’s transformer library that makes it easy to utilize state-of-the-art NLP models. Key Features New: Finetuning Masked Language Models Available language models: XLNET, BERT and ROBERTA. Predict a masked word within a sentence. Fine tune binary sequence classification models to solve problems like sentiment analysis. Predict the likelihood that sentence B follows sentence A within a paragraph. Public Methods HappyROBERTA HappyXLNET HappyBERT Masked Word Prediction ✔ ✔ ✔ Sequence Classification ✔ ✔ ✔ Next Sentence Prediction ✔ Question Answering ✔ Masked Word Prediction Finetuning ✔ ✔ I have contributed directly to Masked Word Prediction and Masked Word Prediction Finetuning.
